list.title: Autonomous systems will make decisions, hold assets, interact with the world.
list.desc: At LazAI, we're building iDAO-governed system so autonomy doesn't mean chaos, it means control by the many.

list.title: When Lies Become Data: The Deadly Impact of Misinformation in Healthcare
list.desc: In the late 1990s, a new painkiller hit the U.S. market. Its name? OxyContin.** Marketed as a safe, low-risk opioid, it was heralded as a breakthrough treatment for chronic pain
